website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Distancestar has proved to be a fast and lightweight track shoe. Built for different types of track competition, most users like that the shoes were generally comfortable, durable, and primed for maximum performance.  The shoe's initial fit does have a few users doubting the overall appeal of the shoe, but this does not stop most track runners for choosing the Distancestar. These shoes do help in propelling the runner forward and help beat personal bests.
pros: Most wearers like the Adidas Distancestar for its highly breathable upper material
A lot of users have said that the Distancestar feels lightweight during their training
Most users have expressed that the shoe has a durable sole
Some users appreciate that the Distancestar has terrific traction while running on the track
A number of several users have praised the shoe for its proper cushioning, especially in the heel area
Many users have commented on how good the shock absorption of the shoe is
Several users like that the shoe is of excellent build quality despite it being a mid-range product
The majority of users appreciate that the shoe is a good value for money for its remarkable performance
The shoe's appealing style is eye-catching to a lot of track runners
A couple of users have said that the shoe's spikes, although shorter than usual, are very effective on the track
cons: Several athletes do not quite like the fact that the Adidas Distancestar fits a bit too tight when first worn
Some reviewers claim the spike is not efficient enough in long-distance events

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. His only issue with them was the fact he chose to get white as he did long jump they got dirty pretty fast. Thats nothing against the quality or design of the shoes just his own color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the incorrect shoes were in the box! Thus 1 star for poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: The shoe with the 3 stripes..
customer_reviews.text: Stylish,Breathability,an overall very nice shoe.It was the ADIDAS pride and their attention to quality and great support that sold me. ADIDAS founder,Adi Dassler was smiling when they made the Distancestar !
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puncsak

customer_reviews.title: High school state caliber shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one of my track athletes on my track team. He had skinny feet and they fit him exactly how we expected. The shoes are light yet sturdy. He performed well in them, even winning silver at State in the 100.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use for track competitions and he loves them. I did have to return the 10 and get a 10.5 because they ran a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Yunia Frias

customer_reviews.title: Used for
customer_reviews.text: Racing. Not good for all distance events like they make it seem. Not very good for anything above 5k. Feel more like 3k, 3200meters, and mile spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Nice Track Spikes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son. He loves the design of the shoe, but he says the shoe fits big. We’re coming to keep the shoes. He will eventually grow into them being that he’s only 15
customer_reviews.author: Trish Rena

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but as with most Adidas, they run slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 14, but I only wear a 14 in these during the summer when I use very thin socks. For the cooler months, I wear a 15.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great spike for foot stability
customer_reviews.text: I run Masters track as a sprinter and the foot protection, traction and lightness of this shoe is fantastic. I enjoy wearing it in training as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My son love this new track shoes for 400 and 800 mts.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Pure Crap
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered to me with one Non-Adidas Track spike screwed into the bottom that didn't fit the tool provided. I like the option of wearing my running shoes with and without spikes (the spikes sort of piss off the owner of the gym when running on their treadmill lol). This being said, the shoes arrived useless to me. The random spike makes me think that they were returned by another customer who tried screwing their own spikes in? Makes no sense...
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were not NEW!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were delivered without spikes. They were obviously worn before, because the bottoms were all scratched up. I spent money for new shoes and these shoes were USED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I ran track and these are the most comfortable shoes to wear for me. My events are 1500 800 and 400 and they are perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Victor

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Distancestar Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Adidas Distancestar AQ0213 Men's Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Seamless toe cap adds durability and protection; Synthetic heel locks foot down while running around the bend
Adiwear in heel offers the ultimate in high-wear durability; Soft EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning
